mapper.select: select * from MNGCOST_MAIN_CTG order by MNGCOST_M_CTG_NO

select * from MNGCOST_INFO where apt_no=#{aptNo} and to_char(mngcost_usedate, 'yyyy-mm') =to_char(add_months(#{mngcostClaimdate}, -1), 'yyyy-mm')
and mngcost_s_ctg_no=#{mngcostSCtgNo}
and mngcost_s_ctg_no in (select mngcost_s_ctg_no from MNGCOST_SUB_CTG where mngcost_m_ctg_no=#{mngcostMCtgNo})
order by mngcost_no desc

select * from MNGCOST_INFO where apt_no=#{aptNo} and to_char(mngcost_usedate, 'yyyy-mm') =to_char(#{currentdate}, 'yyyy-mm')
and mngcost_s_ctg_no=#{mngcostSCtgNo}
and mngcost_s_ctg_no in (select mngcost_s_ctg_no from MNGCOST_SUB_CTG where mngcost_m_ctg_no=#{mngcostMCtgNo})
order by mngcost_no desc
